feature.label: Project configurators for some commonly used maven plugins
feature.description:
Project configurators for some commonly used maven plugins.
Included project configurators:
org.antlr:antlr3-maven-plugin:[3.1.1,):antlr org.codehaus.mojo:antlr-maven-plugin:[2.1,):generate org.codehaus.mojo:build-helper-maven-plugin:*:* org.codehaus.modello:modello-maven-plugin:[1.0.1,):* org.sonatype.plugins:modello-plugin-upgrade:[1.1,):upgrade org.codehaus.plexus:plexus-component-metadata:[1.0-beta-3.0.6,):generate-metadata,generate-test-metadata
